page.title: 14POPULATION OF MARSKE AREA.
page.content: Total number of residents registered on the Electoral Roll is 101, of which 54 are female and 47 male. Total number of children under the age of eighteen is 12. Age distribution :- Over 60 years 39 Over 40 years & under 60 38 Over 20 years & under 40 24 Occupations:- 40% are retired. 50% are in farming or connected with it (one family runs a livestock haulage business.) One sub-post office with a small shop attached. 10% work away from the village; they commute from 6 to 25 miles. Status:- Principally middle class.
